content.rendered:
Photo by Unsplash

This Week in Genesis (#28) a free Genesis theme from Calvin Koepke, WordCamp US Genesis meetup confirmed, and a round-up of Black Friday deals for the Genesis community.

Let’s go.

Themes

Great new free Genesis theme, Letter, from GenesisWP.guide favourite, Calvin Koepke,

Introducing Letter, a Free Genesis Child Theme — https://t.co/iikcrrWwYv #genesiswp

— Calvin Koepke (@cjkoepke) November 24, 2015

Fantastic new StudioPress theme, Digital Pro, in the works by Brian Gardner.

Because I can design something *other* than minimalism — https://t.co/I2o3WoBbxR #genesiswp

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) November 24, 2015

Just Dribbbled … https://t.co/BeCQnuD04P #genesiswp

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) November 25, 2015

…and sadly one from Brian that isn’t going to make it (though I liked it very much on the site it did get used for 😉

Wanna see what a theme looks like when you’re not feeling a design and stop halfway through? https://t.co/GRVJHWgy7x #genesiswp

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) November 25, 2015

…new theme, Sunshine, coming from the folks over at Simple Pro Themes.

Sunshine Pro Genesis Theme – coming this holiday season on https://t.co/GDGEUavCyd #genesiswp #wordpress pic.twitter.com/TNtvrxWteu

— Simple Pro Themes (@SimpleProThemes) November 25, 2015

…PIXL Designs, announce a new theme coming soon called Exodus.

We're almost ready to announce the launch of our first custom #genesiswp theme! Sign up at https://t.co/7WAEarMsIs pic.twitter.com/PtgKqhRhZD

— PIXL Designs (@pixldesigns) November 21, 2015

…and, unless I’m very wrong, I guess this counts as a theme tease from Shay Bocks too.

Y'all. I've partnered with a #genius and it's about to get super saucy up in the #genesiswp world later this week. #justsayin @robneu

— Shay Bocks (@shaybocks) November 24, 2015

Showcase

First up, a nice new site from Cristina Sanz, sommertucker.com

Another cute fitness site running on #lovelyconfetti #wordpresstheme #genesiswp https://t.co/IGGrhJghR4

— Cristina Sanz (@LovelyConfetti) November 25, 2015

…a customisation of the Flex Pro theme for kenfields.net

Showcase – "Sophisticated" customization of Flex Pro theme – https://t.co/KwiHrNJvLz #genesiswp

— Davinder Singh (@idavinder) November 24, 2015

…new site from Jamie Mitchell for thefacialroom.com.au

#genesiswp @nickcdavis Many hrs hard work paid off for the new Facial Room website design/developed by yours truly. https://t.co/PKVUAT8KTM

— Jamie Mitchell (@jamiejmitchell) November 26, 2015

Black Friday

I know a lot of companies (including all my own products and services) are not doing Black Friday deals and I fully respect those that have chosen not to do a sale and their reasoning behind it.

However, there are a few Genesis and other WordPress related deals happening today and it would seem silly not to include them (particularly when I also included StudioPress’ recent sale), so here goes.

  • Beaver Builder – 25% off (with code: HAPPYHOLIDAYS)
  • Binary Turf – 50% off (details)
  • Dynamik Website Builder – 25% off (with code: BLACKFRI25)
  • Flex Pro – 20% off (with code: blackfriday)
  • Musket Theme (via ServerPress.com) – 30% off (details)
  • Utility Pro (via ServerPress.com) – 25% off (details)
  • Web Savvy Marketing – 25% off (details)
  • ZigZagPress – 30% off (with code: bf2015)

I have not listed all the various expiry dates of the deals so please make your own checks to avoid disappointment. In case of any difficulties getting any of the deals above, please contact the vendor directly!

Best of the rest

The WordCamp US Genesis meetup details have been confirmed.

#GenesisWP Meetup #WCUS will be at the Hard Rock Cafe on December 4, from 6pm to 10pm https://t.co/25MXIHVb3o

— Rian Rietveld (@RianRietveld) November 25, 2015

…Shivanand Sharma, shares seven qualities of a good WordPress Genesis developer.

Are you a seasoned Genesis developer? https://t.co/Tala14fcwd #genesiswp

— Shivanand Sharma (@ShivanandWP) November 24, 2015

…plus, more tutorials to look forward to from the machine that is Calvin Koepke.

Upcoming #genesiswp tutorials in the queue: 1. Fade in content as you scroll. 2. Create a progress bar for article length.

— Calvin Koepke (@cjkoepke) November 25, 2015

…if you’re new to Genesis you might enjoy this list of 30 Genesis related resources (including a mention for GenesisWP.guide!).

30+ Resources To Become A Smart Genesis Developer https://t.co/Q6w1sNp79o #genesiswp

— Shivanand Sharma (@ShivanandWP) November 26, 2015

And finally…

If the active install counts of the following Genesis plugins are anything to go by…

@bradleypotter Genesis enews Extended is up there now too. 80k+

— A Guy Named Kraft (@Kraft) November 24, 2015

I thought Sliders were dead 😉 Genesis Responsive Slider – 70,000+ active installs

— Bradley Potter (@bradleypotter) November 24, 2015

…just think how many Genesis sites there are.

@bradleypotter imagine how many #GenesisWP sites there are.

— Nathan Rice (@nathanrice) November 25, 2015

That’s all folks.

For those enjoying a Thanksgiving break, I hope you have a good one.

See you next week (and subscribe *points down*).

PS A big thank you to Tara Claeys for her stellar round-up last week (way better than mine). If you’d like to volunteer to guest edit a future edition, just let me know about your interest (and credentials) via the contact form on this site.

excerpt.rendered: Free Genesis theme from Calvin Koepke, WordCamp US Genesis meetup confirmed and a round-up of Black Friday deals for the Genesis community.
